com.akkaserverless.scalasdk

EntityOptions

trait EntityOptions extends ComponentOptions

Options used for configuring an entity.

Source
EntityOptions.scala

Abstract Value Members

  1.  abstract def forwardHeaders: Set[String]

    returns

    the headers requested to be forwarded as metadata (cannot be mutated, use withForwardHeaders)

    Definition Classes
    EntityOptions → ComponentOptions
  2.  abstract def passivationStrategy: PassivationStrategy

    returns

    the passivation strategy for an entity

  3.  abstract def withForwardHeaders(headers: Set[String]): EntityOptions

    Ask Akka Serverless to forward these headers from the incoming request as metadata headers for the incoming commands.

    Ask Akka Serverless to forward these headers from the incoming request as metadata headers for the incoming commands. By default no headers except "X-Server-Timing" are forwarded.

    Definition Classes
    EntityOptions → ComponentOptions
  4.  abstract def withPassivationStrategy(strategy: PassivationStrategy): EntityOptions

    Create an entity option with the given passivation strategy.

    Create an entity option with the given passivation strategy.

    strategy

    to be used

    returns

    the entity option

  1.  def →[B](y: B): (EntityOptions, B)

    This member is added by an implicit conversion from EntityOptions toArrowAssoc[EntityOptions] performed by method ArrowAssoc in scala.Predef.
    Definition Classes

    Annotations
    @deprecated
    Deprecated

    (Since version 2.13.0) Use -> instead. If you still wish to display it as one character, consider using a font with programming ligatures such as Fira Code.
